data.title: Bengali actress Sreelekha keeps her word, dances to Manike Mage Hithe in viral video. Internet reacts
data.meta_description: As promised, Bengali actress Sreelekha Mitra shared a video of herself dancing to Manike Mage Hithe on Instagram on Tuesday. The viral video has over 60k views.
data.text:
Bengali actress Sreelekha Mitra is the latest celebrity to join the Manike Mage Hithe trend. When Yohani Diloka De Silva uploaded her rendition of the Sinhala song on YouTube in the month of May this year, she had no idea that the song will blow up on the internet. From Bollywood celebrities to Instagram influencers, everyone has been reeling under the spell of this song. Actress Sreelekha Mitra is the latest celebrity to jump on the Manike Mage Hithe bandwagon.

advertisement

In the video Sreelekha Mitra uploaded, she can be seen dancing to the viral Sinhala song. Soon after Yohani uploaded her rendition of Manike Mage Hithe on YouTube, several other musicians have also shared their renditions of the song on social media. Sreelekha performed to the Bangla folk mashup of Manike Mage Hithe. She can be seen dressed in a red sleeveless kurti.

“Jai kotha kintu rakhlam (I kept my word),” she captioned the video. Sreelekha Mitra had uploaded the video on Instagram on November 17.

Watch the video here:

Have you heard the Manike Mage Hithe Bangla folk mashup? If you haven't, we have got you covered.

This is how the internet reacted to Sreelekha's dance video:

Earlier, Sreelekha had shared a video of herself from her workout session on Instagram wherein she had asked her fans and followers if they wanted to see a video of herself dancing to Manike Mage Hithe. Of course, it was a resounding yes and the comments section is proof. Later, she shared the video of herself dancing to Manike Mage Hithe.

Sreelekha Mitra is a Bengali actress who has appeared in films like Sweater, Bhooter Bhobishyot, Borunbabur Bondhu and Once Upon a Time in Calcutta among others.
